channel.title: How do i make a private server
channel.description: hey im looking for a good turtoil on how to make a private server plz help me

item.title: How do i make a private server
item.dc:creator: @john5689 john5689
item.description:
@john5689 wrote:

note: I did copy a bit of the moparscape other tut on making the server like the ipconfig bit and the enviromental things that’s all

Anyways lets get started

This is how to make a server

Step 1: Getting JAVA

This is one of the easiest steps on making a server is getting JDK.

You will need to go on http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp

Then download this 1

And your done

Step 2: getting no-ip

This one is easy as well

Go on http://www.no-ip.com/ make an account your allmost done for no-ip.

now once you have logged in click on

add a host
here

Then after click on

Once u have done that just put your user and the ip name u want then click done.

Step 3: Downloading no-ip thing (To get it running)

Now all you need to do is go back to no-ip and click on downloads

Then click on your oporating system

Step 4: Setting up your Environmental Variables

Ok this step is kinda hard for begginers but you will get the hang of it.

Go on start right click on computer and click on propities

Then you shuld get somthing like this (If you have vista)

Click on

and then click on continue etc.

Once u have done that click on
.

Once u have clicked on that u shuld get another window with 3 bars on the top and the bottom that sas new etc

Click on

then on the variable name bar type in classpath.

then copy and paste this in the second bar on variable value:

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;

click on ok and click on new again on the same 1 on the variable name call it path

Then after copy this into your variable value this

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;

And your done.

Step 5 Downloading a base

Now in order to have a private server you will need to download a base or a server here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html

u will need win rar or 7-zip wich u can get them here:
(http://downloads.sourceforge.net/sevenzip/7za465.zip 7-zip) (http://www.rarlab.com/rar/wrar380.exe for english but go on http://www.rarlab.com/ for the other languages)

Now that’s done your basicley finished. Gratz you have made your very first server (For people who don’t have a routor) (If you do then there’s 1 last thing to do)

step 6: Port fowarding (Only if u have a routor)

now go on start and search CMD

click on the first 1 and do this

Then you shuld see this

Remember your defult gateway

Now type in your defult gateway into your browser (I have netgear) and by defult the user is admin and the pass is password

Now click on

On the Firewall thing click on this

Then copy all these onto yours

Then after apply or add and your done with the firewall thing

Now on services click on this

Then copy these into yours

Log out and you have just finished

CONGRATZ U HAVE JUST MADE YOUR VERY FIRST SERVER AND YOU HAVE PORT FOWARDED

If the port fowarding didn’t help then just go on portfoward.com and spend £15 so that they do it for u.

I will give a tut for that later cuse i’ve spent the whole day doing this

Thanks for looking

John5689

P.S if this dosen’t help then i tryed to help soz if i didn’t helo u.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make a private server
item.dc:creator: @Shorty626 Shorty626
item.description:
@Shorty626 wrote:

The clients are Java too. Hence you run a Java command to launch the client just like you launch your server with a Java application.
